spaceinvaders.server.game

Class GameLoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceinvaders.server.game.GameLoop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>, Service<java.lang.Void>

    public class GameLoop
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service<java.lang.Void>
    Provides methods for handling player input and advancing the game simulation.
